title: The Man Who Camped Out at the Police Station

infobox.Title:: The Man Who Camped Out at the Police Station
infobox.Japanese title:: 警察に居座った男  (Keisatsu ni Isuwatta Otoko)
infobox.Cast:: Conan Edogawa  Kogoro Mouri  Juzo Megure  Wataru Takagi  Kazunobu Chiba
infobox.Animation director:: Seiji Muta (supervisor)  Kaoru Nagakawa  Miyu Hattori  tofu  Zi Dengjia  Michitaka Yamamoto
infobox.Character design:: Masatomo Sudo  Rei Masunaga (sub-character)  Hiroshi Ogawa (design works)
infobox.Voice Cast::
Voice Cast:



Minami Takayama as Conan Edogawa  Rikiya Koyama as Kogoro Mouri  Chafurin as Juzo Megure  Wataru Takagi as Wataru Takagi  Isshin Chiba as Kazunobu Chiba  Ai Bando as Tomoko Yaguchi  Hiroshi Shirokuma as Koji Emoto  Sanryo Odaka as Sanpo Hayashi  Yasuaki Takumi as Yosuke Katsuki

sections.Situation: A man is arrested for the murder of his rival. He confesses but his description of how the murder was done didn´t match with the real situation. Is that really the case, or there's another culprit?
sections.People:
- Victim (strangled or bludgeoned?)
- 27 years old
- Office worker
- 27 years old
- Office worker
- Tomoko's ex-boyfriend
- 25 years old
- Shuhei's fiancé
- Yosuke's ex-girlfriend
- 75 years old
- Neighbor
- 27 years old
- Costruction company employee
- Shuhei's old friend
- Izakaya owner
- Hayashi's dog
- Shiba Inu
sections.Trivia:
- The arrest warrant in this episode is similar to one in The Threat to Megure's Police Career. In this episode, Kento Tanaka is replaced by Kentaro Okuma (大熊 健太郎 ,Ōkuma Kentarō?), who is the real life Detective Conan production adavancement staff in charge of this episode.
- Anime-original locations: Sebundai (瀬分台) and Sakae Town (栄都町).
